Uses of Class
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver.ClientMessageToServer

Packages that use ClientMessageToServer
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver Provides the classes to create a TCP / UDP socket server that communicates using custom serialized Java messages objects. 
org.codemonkey.swiftworldserver Provides the classes to create a World Server, an extension of the Request Socket Server. 
 

Uses of ClientMessageToServer in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver
 

Subclasses of ClientMessageToServer in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver

          Message that handles graceful disconnection attempts by the client.
(package private)  class ClientMessageToServerInvalid
          Wrapper class of which instances substitute bad client-to-server messages.
(package private)  class ClientMessageToServerPingPong
          Message that decodes pong datagrams.
 

Fields in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver with type parameters of type ClientMessageToServer

          A queue that contains unprocessed messages from any client.
private  Map<Integer,Class<? extends ClientMessageToServer<?>>> SwiftSocketServer.clientMessageToServerTypeList
          Used to identify a ClientMessageToServer type that can handle a binary packet.
private  Map<Class<? extends ClientMessageToServer<?>>,Object> SwiftSocketServer.executionContexts
          Contains context objects mapped directly against a executable client message type.
